course_title: Pediatric Acute Care Nurse Practitioner Clinical Practicum II
class_notes: Online asynchronous and synchronous sessions. Face-to-face intensives dates: TBD
course_description: This course will provide a clinical practice preceptorship with faculty oversight to develop skills in health assessment and physical exam, differential diagnosis, diagnostic reasoning and plan of care for individual chronic conditions.
prerequisites: NRSG 616D prerequisite and NRSG 569D co-requisite or equivalent transfer credit. Students must enroll in NRSG 569D first.
sections: Class Nbr: 1541, Section #: 1, Type: CLN, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: M. Goreth, Status: Open
